# Extending Docs

- [Extend WCF](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/index.md): Learn more about: Extending WCF

## Channel Model Overview

- [Channel Model Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/channel-model-overview.md): Learn more about: Channel Model Overview
- [Client Channel-Level Programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/client-channel-level-programming.md): Learn more about: Client Channel-Level Programming
- [Service Channel-Level Programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/service-channel-level-programming.md): Learn more about: Service Channel-Level Programming
- [Understanding State Changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/understanding-state-changes.md): Learn more about: Understanding State Changes
- [Choosing a Message Exchange Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/choosing-a-message-exchange-pattern.md): Learn more about: Choosing a Message Exchange Pattern
- [Handling Exceptions and Faults](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/handling-exceptions-and-faults.md): Learn more about: Handling Exceptions and Faults

## Custom Authorization

- [Custom Authorization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-authorization.md): Learn more about: Custom Authorization
- [How to: Create a Custom Authorization Policy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-policy.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a Custom Authorization Policy
- [How to: Create a Custom Authorization Manager for a Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-manager-for-a-service.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a Custom Authorization Manager for a Service
- [How to: Create a Custom Claim](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-claim.md): Learn how to create a custom claim in WCF. WCF supports a variety of built-in claims and some applications may require custom claims.
- [How to: Compare Claims](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-compare-claims.md): Learn more about: How to: Compare Claims
- [How to: Create a Custom Principal Identity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-principal-identity.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a Custom Principal Identity

## Custom Bindings

- [Custom Bindings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-bindings.md): Learn more about: Custom Bindings
- [How to: Customize a System-Provided Binding](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-customize-a-system-provided-binding.md): Learn more about: How to: Customize a System-Provided Binding

## Custom Credential and Credential Validation

- [Custom Credential and Credential Validation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-credential-and-credential-validation.md): Learn more about: Custom Credential and Credential Validation
- [Walkthrough: Creating Custom Client and Service Credentials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/walkthrough-creating-custom-client-and-service-credentials.md): Learn more about: Walkthrough: Creating Custom Client and Service Credentials
- [How to: Create a Service that Employs a Custom Certificate Validator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-service-that-employs-a-custom-certificate-validator.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a Service that Employs a Custom Certificate Validator
- [How to: Create a Custom Security Token Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-security-token-provider.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a Custom Security Token Provider
- [How to: Create a Custom Security Token Authenticator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-security-token-authenticator.md): Learn more about: How to: create a custom security token authenticator

## Custom Tokens

- [Custom Tokens](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-tokens.md): Learn more about: Custom Tokens
- [How to: Create a Custom Token](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-token.md): Learn how to create a custom security token in WCF using the SecurityToken class and how to integrate it with a security token provider and an authenticator.

## Developing Channels

- [Developing Channels](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/developing-channels.md): Learn more about: Developing Channels

- [Client: Channel Factories and Channels](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/client-channel-factories-and-channels.md): Learn more about: Client: Channel Factories and Channels
- [Creating a BindingElement](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/creating-a-bindingelement.md): Learn more about: Creating a BindingElement
- [Configuration and Metadata Support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/configuration-and-metadata-support.md): Learn more about: Configuration and Metadata Support
